original_text: That person thought that the Lord's command was not important. He has not obeyed God's rules. So you must make that person completely separate from the people. He is a guilty person.’
korean_text: 그런 사람은 여호와의 말씀을 멸시하고 그의 명령을 파괴하였은즉 그의 죄악이 자기에게로 돌아가서 온전히 끊어지리라

sentences.original_text: that the Lord's command was not important
He has not obeyed God's rules
So you must make that person completely separate
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 당신은 그 사람을 완전히 분리시켜야 한다
